MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 3:01pm in the SY24 postcode area of Borth following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:35pm on 30th January 2021.
